Description: Bloom Pad 7 Piece Dynamic Duo Glitz Flower Bulb, 7", Red/White Click Thumbnails to Enlarge EASY BLOOM PAD A patented, biodegradable paper pad containing flower bulbs that will change the way bulbs are planted. Bloom pads were developed with a new generation of gardeners in mind. These new gardeners want planting to be fast and easy. Bloom pads will reduce planting time to only 30 seconds per pad, and takes out all the guess work. The bulbs are pre-spaced and do not need to be adjusted. Simply drop the pad in the hole and enjoy the rest of your day. Bloom pads are also ideal for containers; perfect for the so-called "Urban Gardeners".New and Fast way to Plant Flower bulbsTakes the guess work out of plantingPerfect 1 square foot display of flower bulbs Shipping International Orders: Please allow an additional 3-5 business days handling time.
